Thus/JJ ,/, you/PRP will/MD never/RB be/VB able/JJ to/TO make/VB YCK/NN at/IN home/NN ./. The/DT process/NN of/IN making/VBG the/DT YCK/NN is/VBZ pretty/RB straight/RB forward/VB ./.
